rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample space for coat closet and shoe storage.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan area merging living room and kitchen. Incorporates floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant natural light and seamless indoor-outdoor flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with the living space, featuring high efficiency appliances and ample storage.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area for meals in a cozy setting.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and built-in closet.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom maintaining comfortable space for guests or family members.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom ensuring ample space for extended family or guest usage.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated entertainment area with acoustics in mind and comfortable seating arrangements.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Storage for utilities and additional facilities like laundry or maintenance area.

openings.description: Provides abundant natural light and enhances visual connectivity with the outdoors.
Serves as the primary entry point into the cottage.
